## Experimental.ExtendedArray.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Constructs an [Experimental.ExtendedArray](./ts-utils.experimental.extendedarray.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(itemDescription: string, ...items: T[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  itemDescription | string | Brief description of the type of each item in this array. |
|  items | T\[\] | The initial contents of the array. |
